name: Tap To Circle
description:
Beautiful colors,ninjas, pirates, and zombies.
Once begin, not stop.
Test your fingers and your eyes.
It fulfills all your gaming needs. You'll never want to put it down.
This is one of those games you just want to keep at round after round.
Like all the best casual games, this one is based on a simple idea. Very well implemented, nice music and clear visuals - an ideal game to while away a few spare minutes.
